settings.subtitle: We Supply Solutions
settings.description: Factory Direct Supply offers a vast diversity of products and extensive experience in structural steel fabrication which makes us the go-to source for construction supplies and expert structural steel fabrication projects.

settings.title: We Supply solutions
settings.content: With 6 locations in Florida; Factory Direct Supply offers a vast diversity of products and extensive experience in structural steel fabrication which makes us the go-to source for construction supplies and expert structural steel fabrication projects.

settings.title: Services
settings.content:
• Structural Steel Fabrication
  • 3000 tons per month rebar capacity
  • 6 in house detailers and over 13 outside detailers
  • 2 red iron fabrication locations with state of the art equipment and more than 15 Weld stations
  • Over 1000 completed projects ranging from $10,000 to $4,500,000
  • 5 estimators and detailers inside
  • 7 install crews from 3 men to 20 men
  • AISC certification pending
Our huge selection of building materials and affordable prices along with our fast and friendly service places us at the top of the building material industry.
Same Day and Next Day Delivery, we count with over 20 delivery trucks, including 4 tractors and 10 trailers with full tracking and GPS system to ensure on-time deliveries.
We make it a priority to keep our prices competitive. This is what sets us apart and keeps us ahead of the big name competition.
Our clients include General Contractors, Shell Contractors as well as Specialty Contractors serving commercial, residential, marine and infrastructure construction projects.
We take pride in providing our contractors a comprehensive and reliable supply chain of the materials required to keep their jobs running on time and on budget

Factory Direct Supply is a leading distributor of building materials serving all of South Florida and the Treasure Coast.

Call us today for all your project needs!

settings.heading: Free Shipping & Easy Returns
settings.description: Products are shipped to your home by our Delivery Team
